summary: This is an email chain from May 28, 2020, between law enforcement officials discussing scheduling a call to provide updates on charging decisions regarding Ghislaine Maxwell. The participants include an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: Mentioned as a participant in an upcoming call with a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.

events.title: Email coordination for Maxwell update call
events.description: Law enforcement officials exchange emails to schedule a call to discuss updates on charging decisions regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Proposed call about Maxwell charging
events.description: A call is proposed for the following Tuesday to pass along updates on Maxwell charging decisions.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Office location of the Assistant United States Attorney involved in the correspondence.

locations.name: New York, NY 10007
locations.context: Address (I St. Andrew's Plaza) associated with the Southern District of New York office.

keyFacts: The email chain is focused on scheduling a call to discuss updates on charging decisions regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.
Participants include an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative activity and coordination between federal and local law enforcement regarding Maxwell in May 2020.
